groupData.title: Image

fields.name: expand_on_click
fields.label: Expand on click
fields.text: Show the image in a popup.

fields.name: full_width
fields.label: Full Width
fields.text: Let the image fill the full width of the available space.

groupData.title_template:
<% if(image){ %>
            <%= image_prepared[0].filename %> 
            <% if(aspect_ratio != "default"){ %>
                | aspect ratio: <%= aspect_ratio %> 
            <% } %>
            <% if(alignment && alignment != "left"){ %>
                | Alignment: <%= alignment %>
            <% } %>
        <% } %>

builder_comp_model.title_template:
<% if(image){ %>
            <%= image_prepared[0].filename %> 
            <% if(aspect_ratio != "default"){ %>
                | aspect ratio: <%= aspect_ratio %> 
            <% } %>
            <% if(alignment && alignment != "left"){ %>

groupData.title: Heading
groupData.title_template:
<% if ( heading.content || tagline.content ) { %>
            <% if ( heading.content ) { %>
                <%= heading.content %>
            <% } %>
            |
            <% if ( tagline.content ) { %>
                <%= tagline.content %>
            <% } %>
        <% } else { %>
            This component is empty
        <% } %>

groupData.title: Video
groupData.title_template:
<% if( video_source == "external" ){ %>
            External video | <%= video_type %>: <%= external_url %>
        <% } else { %>
            Selfhosted video | <%= video_type %> | Aspect ratio: <%= aspect_ratio %> 
        <% } %>
